name: CuberPunk 2089
description: CuberPunk 2089 - A game with an open world in a cubical style from the first person! At your disposal the whole city of the future Cube City with a huge bunch of tasks and Easter eggs!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7850 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: 100% compatible with DirectX 10
